NSSavePanel(NDAlias)

Additional methods of NSSavePanel to deal with NDAlias instances.

Extends Class: NSSavePanel
Declared In: NSSavePanel+NDAlias

Discussion

Adds the single method directoryAlias


Methods

-directoryAlias

Returns an NDAlias of the directory currently shown in the receiver.

-setDirectoryAlias:

Sets the current directory currently shown in the receiver to the alias given.

directoryAlias

Returns an NDAlias of the directory currently shown in the receiver. 

- (NDAlias *)directoryAlias;
Return Value

NDAlias

Discussion

Works in a similiar way to -[NSSavePanel directory].

setDirectoryAlias:

Sets the current directory currently shown in the receiver to the alias given. 

- (void)setDirectoryAlias:(NDAlias*)alias;
Discussion

Works in a similiar way to -[NSSavePanel setDirectory].

Last Updated: Wednesday, March 18, 2009
